coverages.details: Covers non-refundable overseas transport and accommodation expenses if the trip is cancelled due to unforeseen circumstances like COVID-19 resulting in serious sickness. The cancelling event must occur after policy purchase and within 30 days before leaving Singapore (unless accidental). Policy must be bought at least 3 days before departure unless the event is accidental. Must fulfill vaccination/test requirements for COVID-19 cover.
Covers additional administrative costs charged by the travel agent or transport/accommodation provider if you have to postpone your trip.

limits.type: Overall section limit - Per insured person
Limit for extra expenses to return to Singapore - Per insured person

coverages.details: Covers non-refundable trip expenses and additional travel costs to return to Singapore if the trip is cut short due to unforeseen circumstances like COVID-19 resulting in serious sickness. Must fulfill vaccination/test requirements for COVID-19 cover.

limits.type: Overall section limit - Per insured person
Limit for accommodation expenses per room per night - Per insured person

coverages.details: Covers additional accommodation and transport expenses incurred overseas if the trip is disrupted due to specified events.

limits.type: Overall section limit - Per insured person
For every six hours of delay while overseas - Adult
For every six hours of delay while overseas - Child
After six hours of delay while in Singapore - Adult
After six hours of delay while in Singapore - Child

coverages.details: Provides cash benefit for every complete 6 consecutive hours of delay of scheduled public transport, provided the delay is not caused by you. Applies to delays overseas or departure delays from Singapore.
Covers additional travel and accommodation expenses to arrange alternative onward travel if you miss a connection due to the late arrival of your incoming connecting public transport.
Provides benefit if you are denied boarding on scheduled public transport due to overbooking and no alternative transport is made available within 6 hours.

coverages.coverage_name: If the travel agency becomes insolvent
coverages.details: Covers loss of irrecoverable travel deposits or trip expenses paid in advance due to the insolvency of the licensed travel agency.

limits.type: Overall section limit - Per insured person
For every six hours of delay while overseas - Adult
For every six hours of delay while overseas - Child
Baggage delay after six hours when arriving in Singapore - Adult
Baggage delay after six hours when arriving in Singapore - Child

coverages.details: Provides cash benefit for every complete 6 consecutive hours your checked-in baggage is delayed by the carrier, either overseas or upon arrival in Singapore.

coverages.coverage_name: Loss or damage of baggage and personal belongings

limits.type: Overall section limit - Per insured person
Limit for laptop - Per insured person
Limit for watches, jewellery or valuables in total - Per insured person
Limit for other items (for each item, set or pair) - Per insured person

coverages.details: Covers loss or damage to your baggage, clothing, and personal belongings during the trip, subject to sub-limits per item/category and overall limits.
Covers loss of cash or traveller's cheques due to theft or robbery during the trip.

limits.type: Overall section limit - Per insured person
Limit for accommodation expenses per room per night - Per insured person

coverages.details: Covers costs of replacing lost passport, travel tickets, and other relevant travel documents, plus related additional travel and accommodation expenses.

coverage_categories.category_name: Personal Accident and Medical Expenses Benefits

limits.type: Adult 70 years old or over - Per insured person
Adult under 70 years old - Per insured person

coverages.details: Provides lump sum payment based on a scale of compensation (e.g., 100% for death/permanent total disability, 50% for one limb/eye) due to an accident during the trip. Total compensation (items a-h) cannot exceed the maximum benefit limit.

coverages.coverage_name: Public transport double cover for accidental death

limits.type: Adult 70 years old or over - Per insured person
Adult under 70 years old - Per insured person

coverages.details: Provides double the accidental death benefit if death occurs as a fare-paying passenger on public transport.

limits.type: Adult 70 years old or over (combined for sections 14, 18 and 19) - Per insured person
Adult under 70 years old - Per insured person
Limit for medical aids and equipment - Per insured person

coverages.details: Covers necessary medical, surgical, hospital, or nursing treatment expenses incurred overseas due to accidental injury or illness during the trip. Includes up to $1,000,000 coverage for COVID-19 related treatment for adults under 70.

limits.type: Adult 70 years old or over - Per insured person
Adult under 70 years old - Per insured person
Limit for medical aids and equipment - Per insured person

coverages.details: Covers follow-up medical expenses incurred in Singapore within a specified period after returning, for an injury or illness sustained overseas during the trip.

coverages.coverage_name: Treatment by a Chinese medicine practitioner or a chiropractor

limits.type: Overall section limit - Per insured person
Limit per visit - Per insured person

coverages.details: Covers expenses for treatment by a registered Chinese medicine practitioner or chiropractor, either overseas or as follow-up treatment in Singapore, subject to policy conditions and per visit sub-limit.

limits.type: Overall section limit - Per insured person
Benefit per day - Per insured person

coverages.details: Provides a daily cash benefit for each full day of hospital confinement overseas due to accidental injury or illness during the trip.

limits.type: Adult 70 years old or over (combined limit under section 14)
Adult under 70 years old - Per insured person

coverages.details: Covers reasonable costs for emergency transportation and medical care during transportation to the nearest suitable medical facility or back to Singapore if medically necessary.

limits.type: Adult 70 years old or over (combined limit under section 14)
Adult under 70 years old - Per insured person

coverages.details: Covers reasonable costs for your return to Singapore (including transportation of mortal remains) if you suffer serious injury, illness, or death during the trip.

limits.type: Overall section limit - Per insured person
Limit for accommodation expenses per room per night - Per insured person

coverages.details: Covers reasonable travel and accommodation expenses for one relative or friend to travel to you if you are hospitalised overseas for more than a specified number of consecutive days.

limits.type: Overall section limit - Per insured person

coverages.details: Provides a daily benefit for each full 24-hour period you are unlawfully detained against your will during the trip.
Covers the cost of emergency telephone calls made necessary by an event covered under the policy.

limits.type: Overall section limit - Per insured person
Limit per item (for each item, set or pair) - Per insured person

coverages.details: Covers loss or damage to your home contents due to burglary or fire occurring while your home was left vacant during your trip.
Covers your legal liability for accidentally causing bodily injury to another person or loss/damage to their property during the trip.
Covers the insurance excess or deductible amount you are liable to pay under the rental vehicle agreement if the rental vehicle is lost or damaged during the trip.

limits.type: Adult 70 years old or over - Per insured person
Adult under 70 years old - Per insured person

coverages.details: Extends the cover provided under Sections 1 to 25 to include losses directly caused by an act of terrorism, subject to the specified limits.

limits.limit: See limits of respective sections that apply.

coverages.details: Provides coverage under Sections 1 to 25 (excluding Section 15 - Medical Expenses in Singapore) for events related to COVID-19, subject to the terms, conditions, and limits of each section. For example, trip cancellation (Section 1) requires COVID-19 to result in serious sickness. You must fulfill all vaccination, pre-departure, and post-arrival test requirements imposed by the destination country or transport operator.

limits.limit: See limits of respective sections that apply.

coverages.details: Allows purchase of Per-trip plans within one day after departing Singapore. Provides cover under Sections 3 to 27 (excluding Section 8 - Travel Agency Insolvency). Excludes claims arising from known events or losses occurring before policy purchase. Covers post-departure benefits like overseas medical expenses and emergency evacuation.

Covers 1 or 2 adults (spouses/partners, >=16 years, parent/legal guardian) and any number of their children (biological/adopted/ward, <21 years). All must be insured under the same policy. For single trip plans, adults and children must travel together.

Covers participation in leisure activities such as scuba diving (PADI certified/instructor-led, max 30m), paddleboarding, white water rafting, skiing, snowboarding, bungee jumping, skydiving, paragliding, abseiling, hiking, trekking (below 4,000m, public access or organised tour/guide), motorcycling, hot air ballooning. Requires adherence to safety procedures and use of licensed guides/instructors where available. Excludes extreme sports.
Coverage period is automatically extended for up to 14 days at no extra cost if return is delayed due to public transport delay (not self-caused) or hospitalisation advised by a medical practitioner.
